Home About Resume

I'm a full stack web developer and articulate visioneer who tailors inspired solutions to both solve problems and grow communities.

Here's what I've built @ General Assembly.

Nourishing Neighbors

My first project allowed people to share a meal, food, clothes, or greeting with a neighbor in need during the holiday season.

Technology Used: Ruby, Active Record, Sinatra, BCrypt, Heroku

See the site See the code

Wanderlust

My group created a website that takes a person's location and finds (and provides driving directions to) the nearest trails.

Technology Used: Ruby, Rails, JQuery, Bootstrap, Several APIs

See the site See the code

DC Tunez

I used the Ticketfly API to find local concerts. I then passed the artist info to the Spotify API to generate streamable playlists.

Technology Used: Ruby, Rails, JQuery, Ticketfly and Spotify APIs

See the site See the code
